Inheritance object VectorMethods Namespace: Similarweb.LinqToDB.Firebolt.Extensions Assembly: Similarweb.LinqToDB.Firebolt.dll Syntax public static class VectorMethods Methods VectorCosineSimilarity(double[], double[]) Implementation for VECTOR_COSINE_DISTANCE Firebolt method. Declaration [Sql.Expression("VECTOR_COSINE_SIMILARITY({0}, {1})", ServerSideOnly = true, IsAggregate = false)] public static double VectorCosineSimilarity(this double[] referenceVector, double[] measuringVector) Parameters Type Name Description double[] referenceVector reference vector. double[] measuringVector vector. Returns Type Description double similarity measure [-1,1]. Remarks Calculates cosine similarity between two vectors using formula. A  B , ||A|| * ||B|| where A and B are vectors, i is the index of the vector element;  is the dot product; ||A|| is length of A, calculated as ((Ai)). LINQ version should be optimized (using ZLinq/SIMD) prior production usage, current implementation is only for reference. Exceptions Type Condition ArgumentException if vector sizes are not equal OR one of vectors has Euclidean length of 0. VectorCosineSimilarity(float[], float[]) Implementation for VECTOR_COSINE_DISTANCE Firebolt method. Declaration [Sql.Expression("VECTOR_COSINE_SIMILARITY({0}, {1})", ServerSideOnly = true, IsAggregate = false)] public static float VectorCosineSimilarity(this float[] referenceVector, float[] measuringVector) Parameters Type Name Description float[] referenceVector reference vector. float[] measuringVector vector. Returns Type Description float similarity measure [-1,1]. Remarks Calculates cosine similarity between two vectors using formula. A  B , ||A|| * ||B|| where A and B are vectors, i is the index of the vector element;  is the dot product; ||A|| is length of A, calculated as ((Ai)). LINQ version should be optimized (using ZLinq/SIMD) prior production usage, current implementation is only for reference. Exceptions Type Condition ArgumentException if vector sizes are not equal OR one of vectors has Euclidean length of 0.
